price: ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߦߌߘߊߞߊ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߛߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߕߏ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ ߘߐ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
